NewText_41:
What's the matter? Do you need to
prepare more?
NewText_22:
The legs... They look just like the rocks we
saw on the way here!
YunBo_BossHint4_10:
We've almost got him, Link! We can finish
him off together!
NewText_11: If you can, you should heal yourself!
NewText_12: I've got this! Heal yourself, goro!
NewText_25:
Hey! If you roll me up the wall, I bet I can
get over to it, goro!
NewText_27:
If we can't hit it higher up, we're gonna be
in trouble!
YunBo_BossHint4_02:
Maybe there's a way to expose its weak
point, Link!
NewText_28: Ooo! That rock... I bet I can break it!
LastBattleJoin_01: Show the Demon King who's boss, Link!
NewText_29:
If we break the part it's attacking with,
it won't be able to do anything!
NewText_04: You all right? Keep it together!
YunBo_BossHint4_05: More bombs, goro! Let me handle it!
YunBo_BossHint4_06:
You're looking rough, Link! Can you use
something to heal yourself?
NewText_19: This armor... Even my weapon can't dent it!
Talk_00:
Those legs will hurt if they hit you.
Be careful, goro!
